opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Moore, Secretary, Florida Department of Corrections v. Bottoson

opinion:
536 U.S. 973

MOORE, SECRETARY, FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS
v.
BOTTOSON.

No. 02A34.

Supreme Court of the United States.

July 10, 2002.

1

Application to vacate stay of execution of sentence of death entered by the Supreme Court of Florida on July 8, 2002, presented to Justice Kennedy, and by him referred to the Court, denied.
